title: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
description: An action-adventure game where players control Link and explore the vast open world of Hyrule

title: Red Dead Redemption 2
description: An action-adventure game set in the Wild West, where players control outlaw Arthur Morgan and his gang

title: The Last of Us Part II
description: A post-apocalyptic action-adventure game where players control Ellie and explore a world ravaged by a fungal pandemic

title: Super Mario Odyssey
description: A 3D platformer where players control Mario and travel to various kingdoms to save Princess Peach from Bowser

title: Fortnite
description: A battle royale game where players fight to be the last one standing in a shrinking play area

title: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare
description: A first-person shooter game where players engage in modern warfare scenarios

title: Minecraft
description: A sandbox game where players can build and explore a blocky, procedurally-generated 3D world

title: Animal Crossing: New Horizons
description: A life simulation game where players build and customize their own island paradise

title: Grand Theft Auto V
description: An action-adventure game where players control three characters in the fictional city of Los Santos

title: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim
description: An action role-playing game set in the open world of Skyrim, where players can explore and complete quests

title: Overwatch
description: A team-based multiplayer first-person shooter game with a diverse cast of characters

title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
description: An action role-playing game where players control Geralt of Rivia and hunt monsters in a vast open world

title: Pokemon Sword & Shield
description: A role-playing game where players explore the Galar region and collect and battle Pokemon

title: Assassin's Creed Valhalla
description: An action role-playing game where players control a Viking raider and explore England during the Dark Ages

title: Super Smash Bros. Ultimate
description: A fighting game where players control various Nintendo characters and battle on a 2D plane

title: Hades
description: An action role-playing game where players control Zagreus and try to escape the underworld

title: Resident Evil Village
description: A survival horror game where players control Ethan Winters and explore a mysterious village

title: Death Stranding
description: An action game where players control Sam Bridges and deliver packages in a post-apocalyptic America

title: Fallout 4
description: An action role-playing game set in a post-apocalyptic Boston where players try to find their missing son

title: League of Legends
description: A multiplayer online battle arena game where players control champions and battle against other teams
